objects.specification: A flat rectangular platform representing the booth floor with a smooth surface texture and subtle matte finish in a neutral tone. It spans approximately six meters in width and four meters in depth with minimal thickness to appear as a slight elevation from the ground plane.

A vertical rectangular panel about three meters high with a smooth matt finish in a light neutral color. The thin backdrop extends the full width of the back wall, creating a clean and continuous surface.
A vertical rectangular panel about three meters high with a smooth matt finish in a light neutral color. The thin sidewall provides consistent coverage and a seamless background.
A vertical rectangular panel about three meters high with a smooth matt finish in a light neutral color. The thin sidewall provides consistent coverage and a seamless background.

A modern rectangular reception counter featuring a flat horizontal top for guest registration and a solid rectangular body with crisp edges. It has a welcoming warm color (RGB 200,50,50) and a slight matte finish, combining clean lines with a friendly appearance.

A minimalist cuboid pedestal display stand with a flat top surface designed to showcase items. It stands about one meter tall with smooth edges, uniform neutral light shade, and a sleek modern profile.

A slender cylindrical round table with a smooth top surface of approximately one meter diameter, supported by a single central cylindrical leg. The design is minimalist with a matte neutral finish and subtle proportions.

A compact chair featuring a flat square seat and straight backrest supported by four slender legs. The minimalist form has crisp edges, uniform neutral tone, and a comfortable seat height around half a meter.

An elongated rectangular fabric banner with minimal thickness and a smooth surface finish. It measures approximately three decimeters wide by one and a half meters long, featuring vivid bright coloration and subtle drape details.

A ceiling-mounted cylindrical spotlight fixture with a slender tubular body and soft rounded edges. It emits a warm light tone (RGB 255,240,200) and features minimal mounting hardware for a clean modern appearance.
